title: Naturally, Italy’s Song for the Olympics Is About Love
summary_full: The 1977 classic “Ti Amo” was so popular that it was recorded in several languages. Now, it takes a spin as the official song for the 2026 Winter Olympics.
summary_public: The 1977 classic “Ti Amo” was so popular that it was recorded in several languages. Now, it takes a spin as the official song for the 2026 Winter Olympics.

IT.label: neutral
IT.evidence: Italy’s Song for the Olympics Is About Love
